pr_title: Realtime get from in-memory segment when possible

timeline.message: Realtime get from in-memory segment when possible

timeline.bodyText:
Can we assert that leafReader.luceneReaderHolder.get() == null?
Or perhaps even
assert leafReader.luceneReaderHolder.trySet(null)

to ensure it throws if we later trigger the creation of the lucene reader?
I wonder if we could delegate from the single-doc-leaf-reader to two underlying leaf-readers and instantiate it at this time? I.e., we explicitly set leafReader.delegate to one of two implementations (translog or lucene memory backed) once we have found out which version we need? That would make the code slightly more explicit about this.
timeline.author: henningandersen
